name: Silver Darts
text: A cone of silver darts springs from your hand. These darts act as a silver weapon that deals 1d6 points of piercing damage per caster level (maximum 10d6). Any creature with an armor bonus greater than +4 or a natural armor bonus greater than +4 takes 50% less damage.
components_zh: 语言，姿势，材料（一根银针）
text_zh: 成片的银镖从你手中发射出去。这些飞镖视同造成每施法者等级1d6点穿刺伤害（最高10d6）的银质武器（silver weapon）。若生物具有+4点或更高的护甲加值或天生防御加值，则受到的伤害会减少50%。
